name: Trevenant
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It’s kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.

abilities.name: Nervous Seed
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, the attacks of your opponent’s Basic Pokémon cost {C} more.

attacks.name: Energy Press
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
